Class MoveEffect

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class MoveEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius this class contains all the info about effects that move other players/yourself

      • availableCellsMoveTarget

        public java.util.List<Cell> availableCellsMoveTarget(Player selectedPlayer)
        called by Choices used for newton powerup and moveAfter effects
        Parameters:
        selectedPlayer - the player to move
        Returns:
        the list of cells where you can move the selected player

      • availablePlayersToMove

        public java.util.List<Character> availablePlayersToMove(java.util.List<Player> allPlayers,
                                                        Player owner)
        this method is called by controller (Choices) used for the moveBeforeShoot
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - all Players
        owner - the owner of the weapon
        Returns:
        a list of characters that can be moved applying the move effect
